table.name: evvtmenu
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_evvtmenu` ( `evvtmenuid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `mtype` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `mvalue` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `mlabel` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `mparent` int(11) NOT NULL, `mseq` smallint(6) NOT NULL, `mvisible` tinyint(4) NOT NULL, `mpermission` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`evvtmenuid`), KEY `mparent` (`mparent`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;
